scripts.clean: rm -rf build coverage .nyc_output browserify-tests node browser dist
scripts.clean-build-test: yarn clean && yarn build-tsc && yarn test
scripts.print-platform-support: yarn clean && yarn build-tsc && node build/print-platform-support.js
scripts.browserify-tests-all: mkdir      -p browserify-tests && browserify build/test/universal/*.test.js build/test/browser/*.test.js build/test/improved/*.browser.test.js build/test/browser-run-exit.js > browserify-tests/bundle.test.js
scripts.browserify-tests-old: mkdir      -p browserify-tests && browserify build/test/universal/*.test.js build/test/browser/*.test.js                                       build/test/browser-run-exit.js > browserify-tests/bundle.test.js
scripts.browserify-tests-improved: mkdir -p browserify-tests && browserify                                                             build/test/improved/*.browser.test.js build/test/browser-run-exit.js > browserify-tests/bundle.test.js
scripts.test.browser-all: yarn      clean && yarn build-tsc && yarn browserify-tests-all      && yarn browser-run-tests
scripts.test.browser-old: yarn      clean && yarn build-tsc && yarn browserify-tests-old      && yarn browser-run-tests
scripts.test.browser-improved: yarn clean && yarn build-tsc && yarn browserify-tests-improved && yarn browser-run-tests
scripts.benchmark.browser: yarn clean && yarn build-tsc && mkdir -p benchmark-results && yarn browserify-benchmark && yarn browser-run-benchmark | tee benchmark-results/benchmark.browser.txt
scripts.benchmark.node: yarn clean && yarn build-tsc && mkdir -p benchmark-results && node --expose-gc build/test/node/*.benchmark.js | tee benchmark-results/benchmark.node.txt
scripts.depchart-main: mkdir     -p depchart && depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude src/print-platform-support.ts src/decls.d.ts src/index.ts src/index.browser.ts src/shims/*.ts src/entries/*.ts `find src | grep '/test/'` `find src | grep '/util/'` `find src | grep '/experimental/'` --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-main --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart-no-types: mkdir -p depchart && depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude src/print-platform-support.ts src/decls.d.ts src/index.ts src/index.browser.ts src/shims/*.ts src/entries/*.ts `find src | grep '/test/'` `find src | grep '/util/'` `find src | grep '/experimental/'` `find src | grep types.ts` --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-no-types --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart-deps: mkdir     -p depchart && depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude src/print-platform-support.ts src/decls.d.ts src/index.ts src/index.browser.ts src/shims/*.ts src/entries/*.ts `find src | grep '/test/'` `find src | grep '/util/'` `find src | grep '/experimental/'` `find src | grep types.ts` --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-deps --node_modules integrated
scripts.depchart-loose: mkdir    -p depchart && depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude src/print-platform-support.ts src/decls.d.ts src/index.ts src/index.browser.ts src/shims/*.ts src/entries/*.ts `find src | grep '/test/'` `find src | grep '/util/'` `find src | grep '/experimental/'` --loose --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-loose --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart: yarn depchart-main & yarn depchart-deps & yarn depchart-loose & yarn depchart-no-types && echo 'done'
